extendedInfo.description: Green dictionary of 850+ environmental, ecological, solar power & wind power, energy efficiency, climate change, weather, recycling, global warming and general 'green' terms and definitions. Totally Free!Helps you understand climate change and various environmental issues better. Learn more about how the planet Earth really works and how you can live better with the environment.Features include:  - A to Z listing that is easy to use. All the way from 'Abrupt Climate Change' to 'Flocculation' to 'Thermal Mass' to 'Zonation'  - All locally stored, does not need net access to work  - Preference for changing text size to suit your screen  - Single click: cross linking to related entries & blog posts; link out to use search engine & link out to related articles  - Keyword based search across all entries  - Built in directory of related sites  - Best of ten quiz - helps you learn the definitions  - Works with android search widget (menu > Settings > Searchable Items, select Green Dictionary)  - Less than 450k in size, hardly takes up any space!In short a useful eco and green dictionary in your pocket. Great as a study aid.Keywords: AGW, environment, ecology, sceptical, environmental science, climate change, alternative energy, solar power, biodegradable, green, carbon dioxide co2, composting, passive solar, ecofriendly, global warming, organic, renewable, recycling, wind power, geothermal, geography, greenhouse gases, air pollution, carbon emissions, alternative energy, green home, sustainable development, ecology, energy, weather, food, fuel, heat, world, life, education, research, skeptical, atmosphere, geothermal heat pump, wind turbine, ocean, trading, whaling, peace, fraking, coal, forests, gm, genetically modified, natural gas, wind farms, emissions, biofuels, climategate, saving power, cutting bills, alternative energy, triple bottom line, global weirding

reviews.title: I can\'t read it!
reviews.comment: Looks like a really good app, but the font is way too small for my old eyes.  Doesn\'t seem to be a way to make it larger.
reviews.author: Scott Fisher

reviews.comment: Does NOT have most words needed!!  FAILING SCIENCE NOW!!!!!!!! >:(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not as helpful as expected
reviews.comment: As a environmental studies major, many words and definitions were not in this dictionary. I couldn\'t find terms such as? Environmental racism, ecocenteic, zoocentric, and many other. Maybe this app is better suited for high school students because it is not college appropriate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Informative, easy to use and loving the quiz. Multiple choice for font sizes. Get it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Two stars because the font is ridiculously TINY. Wealth of words, UI could be better, more descriptions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Informative
reviews.comment: Its very useful & must download app to all those environment study lovers...
reviews.author: A Google User
